description: Spell registry with scaling rules and categories. All spells have type='spell'.

scalingRules.diceCount: All spells start at diceCount: 1. Higher level spells may increase dice count based on spell design.
scalingRules.prowess: Mana cost formula: prowess = spellLevel + ceil(spellLevel / 3)

evocation.description: Damage-dealing spells that manipulate energy and elements

abjuration.description: Protective magic that wards and shields
abjuration.examples: Shield, Protection from Evil, Dispel Magic

enchantment.description: Mind-affecting magic that influences thoughts and emotions

illusion.description: Deceptive magic that creates false sensory impressions

necromancy.description: Magic dealing with death, undeath, and life force
necromancy.examples: Animate Dead, Life Drain, Speak with Dead

transmutation.description: Magic that transforms and alters physical properties

divination.description: Magic that reveals information and detects hidden things

evocation.name: Magic Missile
evocation.description:
Conjures glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike targets, dealing force damage. Each dart automatically hits its target.

Scaling: At dice count 3, fires two additional darts. At dice count 6, fires four additional darts. At dice count 9, darts can pass through cover. At dice count 12, each dart explodes on impact. At dice count 15, creates a barrage of ten darts.

evocation.name: Acid Arrow
evocation.description:
Conjures a glowing arrow of acid that melts through armor and continues burning, dealing acid damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the acid continues to burn for an additional round. At dice count 6, creates a splash that damages nearby creatures. At dice count 9, melts through metal armor. At dice count 12, creates a pool of acid. At dice count 15, the acid becomes incredibly corrosive, destroying nonmagical objects.

evocation.name: Fireball
evocation.description:
Hurls an explosive sphere of flame that detonates in a fiery blast, dealing fire damage to all creatures in a 20-foot radius.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the radius increases to 30 feet. At dice count 6, the radius increases to 40 feet and ignites flammable objects. At dice count 9, creates secondary explosions. At dice count 12, leaves the area burning for 1 minute. At dice count 15, the explosion is massive, with a 60-foot radius.

evocation.name: Lightning Bolt
evocation.description:
Unleashes a stroke of lightning that arcs toward targets in a 100-foot line, dealing lightning damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the bolt can curve around corners. At dice count 6, strikes two parallel lines. At dice count 9, stuns targets briefly. At dice count 12, bounces off surfaces. At dice count 15, creates a sustained lightning stream.

evocation.name: Cone of Cold
evocation.description:
Blasts forth a 60-foot cone of freezing air and ice, dealing cold damage to all creatures in the area.

Scaling: At dice count 3, freezes the ground creating difficult terrain. At dice count 6, can freeze creatures solid. At dice count 9, creates ice walls where the cone hits surfaces. At dice count 12, the cone extends to 90 feet. At dice count 15, flash-freezes everything, potentially shattering frozen creatures.

evocation.name: Chain Lightning
evocation.description:
Creates a bolt of lightning that arcs and jumps between multiple targets within 30 feet of each other, dealing lightning damage. Hits up to 3 targets.

Scaling: At dice count 3, chains to 5 targets. At dice count 6, chains to 7 targets and can hit the same target twice. At dice count 9, chains to 10 targets. At dice count 12, creates branching lightning storms. At dice count 15, hits unlimited targets in range.

evocation.name: Flame Strike
evocation.description:
Calls down a column of divine fire from above to incinerate enemies in a 10-foot radius, 40-foot high cylinder, dealing radiant and fire damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the radius increases to 15 feet. At dice count 6, calls down multiple pillars in a 30-foot area. At dice count 9, the flames are holy and bypass resistances. At dice count 12, leaves blessed flames that heal allies. At dice count 15, summons a rain of divine fire over a 60-foot radius.

evocation.name: Meteor Swarm
evocation.description:
Summons blazing meteors from the sky to rain down on enemies, creating four 40-foot radius explosions anywhere within range, dealing fire and bludgeoning damage.

Scaling: At dice count 6, summons eight meteors. At dice count 9, meteors leave craters and burning terrain. At dice count 12, calls down a continuous meteor shower. At dice count 15, summons apocalyptic meteor storm covering a 500-foot radius.

abjuration.name: Shield
abjuration.description:
Creates an invisible barrier of magical force that protects you, granting +5 to AC until the start of your next turn.

Scaling: At dice count 3, also grants resistance to force damage. At dice count 6, reflects projectiles back at attackers. At dice count 9, the shield lasts for 1 minute. At dice count 12, can protect adjacent allies. At dice count 15, creates an impenetrable force dome.

abjuration.name: Protection from Evil
abjuration.description:
Wards a creature against attacks from evil creatures, granting advantage on saves against their abilities and preventing possession.

Scaling: At dice count 3, extends to protect against aberrations and undead. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, actively repels evil creatures. At dice count 12, duration extends to 1 hour. At dice count 15, creates a permanent ward until dispelled.

abjuration.name: Resist Energy
abjuration.description:
Grants resistance to a chosen energy type (fire, cold, lightning, or acid), reducing damage of that type by half.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can choose two energy types. At dice count 6, grants immunity instead of resistance. At dice count 9, can protect multiple creatures. At dice count 12, also reflects 25% of energy damage back. At dice count 15, grants immunity to all energy types.

abjuration.name: Dispel Magic
abjuration.description:
Ends ongoing magical effects within range. Automatically dispels spells of 3rd level or lower; higher level spells require a check.

Scaling: At dice count 3, automatically dispels 5th level spells. At dice count 6, affects a 20-foot radius. At dice count 9, automatically dispels 7th level spells. At dice count 12, can target multiple effects. At dice count 15, creates an antimagic pulse that dispels everything in 60 feet.

abjuration.name: Stoneskin
abjuration.description:
Hardens the target's flesh to the toughness of stone, granting resistance to nonmagical physical damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, also grants resistance to magical physical damage. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, the skin becomes adamantine, granting damage reduction. At dice count 12, attackers take damage when they hit you. At dice count 15, you become nearly invulnerable to physical attacks.

abjuration.name: Wall of Force
abjuration.description:
Creates an invisible wall of pure magical force that is completely impenetrable. The wall can be shaped as a dome, sphere, or flat panels.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the wall becomes mobile. At dice count 6, can create multiple walls. At dice count 9, the wall damages creatures that touch it. At dice count 12, duration extends to 1 hour. At dice count 15, creates a permanent force structure.

abjuration.name: Antimagic Field
abjuration.description:
Creates a 10-foot radius sphere where magic cannot function and spells are suppressed. Magical items become mundane and spells cannot be cast.

Scaling: At dice count 3, radius increases to 20 feet. At dice count 6, can exclude certain magical effects. At dice count 9, radius increases to 30 feet. At dice count 12, the field becomes mobile and can be projected. At dice count 15, creates a permanent antimagic zone.

conjuration.name: Create Water
conjuration.description:
Conjures fresh, drinkable water from thin air, creating up to 10 gallons that fills containers or creates puddles.

Scaling: At dice count 3, creates 50 gallons. At dice count 6, can create other liquids (wine, oil). At dice count 9, creates 200 gallons. At dice count 12, can create a flowing stream. At dice count 15, creates a permanent water source.

conjuration.name: Summon Familiar
conjuration.description:
Summons a magical animal companion (cat, owl, rat, raven, etc.) to serve you. You can communicate telepathically and see through its eyes.

Scaling: At dice count 3, familiar gains enhanced abilities. At dice count 6, can summon exotic familiars. At dice count 9, familiar can cast cantrips. At dice count 12, summon multiple familiars. At dice count 15, familiar becomes a powerful magical creature.

conjuration.name: Misty Step
conjuration.description:
Teleports you up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see in a puff of silvery mist.

Scaling: At dice count 3, range increases to 60 feet. At dice count 6, can bring one willing creature. At dice count 9, can teleport as a reaction. At dice count 12, range increases to 120 feet. At dice count 15, can teleport at will for 1 minute.

conjuration.name: Web
conjuration.description:
Conjures thick, sticky webs that fill a 20-foot cube, heavily obscuring the area and restraining creatures that enter.

Scaling: At dice count 3, webs are fireproof. At dice count 6, creates 40-foot cube. At dice count 9, webs are stronger and harder to escape. At dice count 12, webs deal damage to restrained creatures. At dice count 15, creates a massive web network covering 100 feet.

conjuration.name: Dimension Door
conjuration.description:
Teleports you up to 500 feet to a location you can visualize, passing through barriers and obstacles. Can bring one willing creature.

Scaling: At dice count 3, range increases to 1000 feet. At dice count 6, can bring multiple creatures. At dice count 9, can teleport to any location you've been before. At dice count 12, leaves no trace and cannot be tracked. At dice count 15, can teleport between planes.

conjuration.name: Summon Monster
conjuration.description:
Summons an extraplanar creature (elemental, demon, etc.) to do your bidding. The creature is friendly and obeys your commands.

Scaling: At dice count 3, summons a more powerful creature. At dice count 6, can summon multiple creatures. At dice count 9, summoned creatures are enhanced. At dice count 12, can summon legendary creatures. At dice count 15, summons an army of creatures.

conjuration.name: Teleport
conjuration.description:
Instantly transports you and up to 8 willing creatures to a distant location you've been to before. Unfamiliar destinations carry risk of mishap.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can teleport to locations you've only seen. At dice count 6, eliminates risk of mishap. At dice count 9, can bring more creatures or objects. At dice count 12, can create permanent teleportation circles. At dice count 15, can teleport across planes without error.

enchantment.name: Charm Person
enchantment.description:
Makes a humanoid regard you as a trusted friend. The target has advantage on social interactions with you but won't do anything harmful to itself.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect multiple humanoids. At dice count 6, works on any creature type. At dice count 9, duration extends to 8 hours. At dice count 12, the charm is much stronger and harder to break. At dice count 15, creates permanent loyalty.

enchantment.name: Sleep
enchantment.description:
Sends creatures into a magical slumber in a 20-foot radius. Affects the weakest creatures first based on their hit points.

Scaling: At dice count 3, affects more hit points of creatures. At dice count 6, radius increases to 40 feet. At dice count 9, can affect stronger creatures. At dice count 12, sleep is very deep and hard to wake from. At dice count 15, puts entire armies to sleep.

enchantment.name: Hold Person
enchantment.description:
Paralyzes a humanoid, rendering them unable to move or act. The target can repeat the save each round to break free.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect 2 humanoids. At dice count 6, works on any creature type. At dice count 9, paralysis is harder to resist. At dice count 12, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 15, creates a zone of paralysis.

enchantment.name: Suggestion
enchantment.description:
Magically influences a creature to follow a suggested course of action that sounds reasonable. The suggestion must be worded to sound reasonable.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can suggest to multiple creatures. At dice count 6, suggestions can be more complex. At dice count 9, no concentration required. At dice count 12, can implant delayed suggestions. At dice count 15, mass suggestion affecting dozens of creatures.

enchantment.name: Fear
enchantment.description:
Projects a terrifying image in a 30-foot cone that causes creatures to flee in panic, using their action to move away from you.

Scaling: At dice count 3, cone extends to 60 feet. At dice count 6, frightened creatures are also stunned. At dice count 9, creates a zone of fear. At dice count 12, fear is so intense creatures may die of fright. At dice count 15, spreads terror across a mile radius.

enchantment.name: Confusion
enchantment.description:
Scrambles the minds of creatures in a 10-foot radius, making them act randomly and unpredictably each turn. They might attack allies, stand still, or flee.

Scaling: At dice count 3, radius increases to 20 feet. At dice count 6, confusion is more severe with worse outcomes. At dice count 9, can affect more creatures. At dice count 12, creates permanent madness. At dice count 15, drives entire armies insane.

enchantment.name: Dominate Person
enchantment.description:
Takes complete control of a humanoid's actions. You can command them telepathically and they follow your orders to the best of their ability.

Scaling: At dice count 3, works on any creature type. At dice count 6, duration extends to 10 minutes. At dice count 9, can control multiple creatures. At dice count 12, control lasts for 1 hour. At dice count 15, creates permanent mental domination.

illusion.name: Disguise Self
illusion.description:
Makes you look different, changing your appearance including clothing, armor, and equipment. Does not change your body shape but can make you appear taller or shorter.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can change apparent size significantly. At dice count 6, can disguise others. At dice count 9, disguise includes sound and smell. At dice count 12, can appear as specific individuals. At dice count 15, the illusion is perfect and undetectable.

illusion.name: Silent Image
illusion.description:
Creates a visual illusion of an object, creature, or phenomenon in a 15-foot cube. The illusion has no sound, smell, or texture.

Scaling: At dice count 3, illusion can move and animate. At dice count 6, can create multiple images. At dice count 9, images include sound. At dice count 12, creates tactile illusions. At dice count 15, creates fully real-seeming illusions.

illusion.name: Blur
illusion.description:
Distorts your form, making you appear as a hazy, shifting blur. Attackers have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Scaling: At dice count 3, also grants advantage on Dexterity saves. At dice count 6, can affect allies. At dice count 9, you can move through enemies. At dice count 12, become nearly impossible to target. At dice count 15, phase partially out of reality.

illusion.name: Invisibility
illusion.description:
Renders a creature completely invisible until they attack or cast a spell. Items carried and worn become invisible as well.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 6, invisibility doesn't end when attacking. At dice count 9, no concentration required. At dice count 12, can become invisible at will. At dice count 15, grants permanent invisibility.

illusion.name: Mirror Image
illusion.description:
Creates 3 illusory duplicates of yourself that confound attackers. When attacked, there's a chance the attack hits a duplicate instead of you.

Scaling: At dice count 3, creates 5 duplicates. At dice count 6, duplicates can move independently. At dice count 9, creates 7 duplicates that fight. At dice count 12, duplicates are semi-real and can deal damage. At dice count 15, creates unlimited duplicates.

illusion.name: Greater Invisibility
illusion.description:
Turns a creature invisible even while attacking or casting spells. The invisibility persists through any action.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 6, grants advantage on attacks while invisible. At dice count 9, no concentration required. At dice count 12, duration extends to 10 minutes. At dice count 15, invisibility cannot be dispelled or detected.

illusion.name: Phantasmal Killer
illusion.description:
Creates a nightmarish illusion of the target's deepest fears visible only to them. Each turn, the target takes psychic damage and must save or be frightened.

Scaling: At dice count 3, fear can kill weak creatures. At dice count 6, affects multiple targets. At dice count 9, the nightmare becomes partially real. At dice count 12, nightmare manifests for all to see. At dice count 15, can kill even powerful creatures with fear.

necromancy.name: Cause Wounds
necromancy.description:
Channels negative energy through your touch to deal necrotic damage to a creature you touch.

Scaling: At dice count 3, wounds continue to bleed. At dice count 6, can affect at range. At dice count 9, prevents healing temporarily. At dice count 12, causes festering wounds. At dice count 15, can cause instant death to weak creatures.

necromancy.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
necromancy.description:
A beam of enervating energy saps the target's strength, causing them to deal only half damage with weapon attacks using Strength.

Scaling: At dice count 3, also reduces Constitution. At dice count 6, affects multiple targets. At dice count 9, weakening is more severe. At dice count 12, can drain all physical stats. At dice count 15, causes complete paralysis.

necromancy.name: Animate Dead
necromancy.description:
Raises corpses or piles of bones as undead servants (skeletons or zombies) that obey your commands. You can control up to 4 undead at once.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can control more undead. At dice count 6, creates more powerful undead. At dice count 9, undead are intelligent and skilled. At dice count 12, creates specialized undead. At dice count 15, raises armies of undead.

necromancy.name: Vampiric Touch
necromancy.description:
Your touch drains life force from enemies and transfers it to heal your wounds. You deal necrotic damage and regain hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

Scaling: At dice count 3, heal for full damage dealt. At dice count 6, can steal temporary hit points. At dice count 9, drains multiple attributes. At dice count 12, can work at range. At dice count 15, can drain permanent life force.

necromancy.name: Blight
necromancy.description:
Drains moisture and vitality from a creature, dealing necrotic damage. Particularly effective against plants, dealing maximum damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, affects an area. At dice count 6, withers the land around targets. At dice count 9, creates zones of death. At dice count 12, can kill plants instantly. At dice count 15, creates permanent dead zones.

necromancy.name: Circle of Death
necromancy.description:
A sphere of necromantic energy bursts outward in a 60-foot radius, withering all life within and dealing massive necrotic damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, radius increases to 90 feet. At dice count 6, killed creatures rise as undead. At dice count 9, creates lingering death energy. At dice count 12, can affect huge areas. At dice count 15, kills everything in a 200-foot radius.

necromancy.name: Finger of Death
necromancy.description:
Sends negative energy coursing through a creature, potentially killing it instantly. Deals massive necrotic damage, and creatures killed by this spell rise as zombies under your control.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect multiple targets. At dice count 6, raised zombies are more powerful. At dice count 9, instant death on failed save. At dice count 12, creates powerful undead servants. At dice count 15, can kill nearly anything with a gesture.

transmutation.name: Expeditious Retreat
transmutation.description:
Greatly increases your movement speed, allowing you to take the Dash action as a bonus action on each turn.

Scaling: At dice count 3, doubles movement speed. At dice count 6, can affect allies. At dice count 9, can move through difficult terrain. At dice count 12, grants supernatural speed. At dice count 15, can move at the speed of thought.

transmutation.name: Enlarge Person
transmutation.description:
Causes a creature to grow to twice its normal size, increasing its size category. The target gains advantage on Strength checks and deals extra damage.

Scaling: At dice count 3, target grows even larger. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, grants additional benefits like reach. At dice count 12, become giant-sized. At dice count 15, grow to colossal proportions.

transmutation.name: Haste
transmutation.description:
Doubles a creature's speed and grants an additional action each turn for the duration. When the spell ends, the target is lethargic for one turn.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect 2 creatures. At dice count 6, grants even more actions. At dice count 9, no lethargy afterward. At dice count 12, affects multiple creatures. At dice count 15, grants supernatural speed and multiple extra actions.

transmutation.name: Slow
transmutation.description:
Drastically reduces the speed and reaction time of up to 6 creatures in a 40-foot cube. Targets have reduced movement, can't take reactions, and can take only one action or bonus action per turn.

Scaling: At dice count 3, affects more creatures. At dice count 6, slowing is more severe. At dice count 9, can freeze creatures in time briefly. At dice count 12, creates zones of slow time. At dice count 15, stops time for enemies.

transmutation.name: Polymorph
transmutation.description:
Transforms a creature into a different beast form. The target gains the beast's statistics but retains its personality. When reduced to 0 HP, reverts to original form.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can transform into more powerful beasts. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, can polymorph into magical beasts. At dice count 12, transformations last longer. At dice count 15, can permanently transform creatures.

transmutation.name: Stone Shape
transmutation.description:
Molds and sculpts stone into any shape you desire, allowing you to create passages, sculptures, or modify stone structures.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect more stone. At dice count 6, can shape metal as well. At dice count 9, creations are permanent and detailed. At dice count 12, can create complex stone mechanisms. At dice count 15, can reshape entire stone structures or mountains.

transmutation.name: Disintegrate
transmutation.description:
Transforms matter into fine dust with a thin green ray, dealing massive force damage. A creature reduced to 0 HP is completely disintegrated along with what they're wearing.

Scaling: At dice count 3, affects larger objects. At dice count 6, can pierce through multiple targets. At dice count 9, disintegrates nearly anything. At dice count 12, creates disintegration zones. At dice count 15, erases targets from existence.

divination.name: Detect Magic
divination.description:
Senses the presence of magic within 30 feet. You can determine the school of magic and see a faint aura around magical objects and creatures.

Scaling: At dice count 3, range increases to 60 feet. At dice count 6, can identify specific spells. At dice count 9, can see through illusions. At dice count 12, range increases to 120 feet. At dice count 15, detects all magic within a mile.

divination.name: Identify
divination.description:
Reveals the properties of a magical object, including how to use it, whether it requires attunement, and any curses it carries.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can identify multiple objects. At dice count 6, reveals hidden properties. At dice count 9, can identify at range. At dice count 12, learns object's history. At dice count 15, knows everything about any object.

divination.name: Locate Object
divination.description:
Senses the direction to a known object within 1000 feet. Can locate a specific object you've seen or a general type of object.

Scaling: At dice count 3, range increases to 5 miles. At dice count 6, can locate creatures as well. At dice count 9, can locate across planes. At dice count 12, pinpoints exact location. At dice count 15, can find anything anywhere.

divination.name: See Invisibility
divination.description:
Allows you to see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible. You can also see into the Ethereal Plane.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can grant this to allies. At dice count 6, see through all illusions. At dice count 9, see in darkness and through walls. At dice count 12, see the true form of all things. At dice count 15, omniscient vision in your area.

divination.name: Clairvoyance
divination.description:
Creates an invisible sensor at a distant location you've been to or can see. You can see or hear (choose one) through the sensor.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can see and hear simultaneously. At dice count 6, range extends to 10 miles. At dice count 9, can create multiple sensors. At dice count 12, sensors can move. At dice count 15, can observe anywhere on the same plane.

divination.name: Scrying
divination.description:
Observes a creature at any distance through magical sight. You can see and hear the target and their surroundings. The target can make a save to resist.

Scaling: At dice count 3, target has disadvantage on save. At dice count 6, can scry multiple targets. At dice count 9, can scry across planes. At dice count 12, scrying is undetectable. At dice count 15, can communicate through the scrying sensor.

divination.name: True Seeing
divination.description:
Grants the ability to see through all illusions, darkness, and hidden doors. You can see invisible creatures, detect secret doors, and perceive the true form of shapeshifters.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can see into other planes. At dice count 6, can grant to multiple creatures. At dice count 9, see the future briefly. At dice count 12, see all hidden things. At dice count 15, omniscient sight that sees all truths.
